channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: An integrated national data system (INDS) is not just an aspirational model. It is something that every country can work toward today. Here's what we learned from 🇪🇪Estonia, 🇬🇭Ghana, and 🇲🇽Mexico: https://t.co/KC5y7HYdam

I used this tweet as inspiration to build a shiny where users browse a set of debt contracts on a DT and select a single row. This selection feeds another DT with some related documents. Now it's easy to choose a single document to see its pdf. #RStats #EconTwitter #OpenData https://t.co/WYqxa3SMLB https://t.co/WSIaFflaIo

Juntar Lima Metropolitana y el Callao es sesgar la densidad poblacional y por ende la tasa de mortalidad. Según datos oficiales del @DGE_MINSA es la región Callao la que tiene la mayor Tasa de Mortalidad seguido por Lima Metropolitana. #OpenData 🇵🇪 https://t.co/B1eTGEoFVL https://t.co/SX8GW6ACd1

Los alimentos saludables son caros... y los poco saludables, baratos. A medida que los países se desarrollan, sus sistemas alimentarios se vuelven más eficaces en la provisión de alimentos más sanos a bajo costo. https://t.co/5T6gPL4Xq3

I'm no historian, but I believe that the rich created the idea that individuals can solve global crises solely by their own "everyday choices". For anyone else who has lived in poverty, we know that "choices" are a luxury. Only the rich would propose an idea (1/n)

Your regular reminder that there is still no national #opendata available for Public Rights of Way. That's why the information isn't readily available in the free online maps that most people use. #rightsofway #righttoroam #geospatial
1/3 https://t.co/v8xXjB7zsu

Ik wil mijn diepe waardering en respect uitspreken, voor iedereen die moeite doet om zoveel mogelijk open data te delen, transparant te zijn en uitleg te geven, zodat iedereen toegang heeft tot informatie die nodig is om jezelf veilig te kunnen houden.
Dankjewel! 🙏 #Samenleving

Interesting how Big Tech loves open data but only provides proprietary APIs in return… I wonder why that is?
🤔
#extraction #enclosure #privatisation

Big Tech loves open data for the same reason thieves love an open door.
#extraction #enclosure #privatisation

Il Canada ha superato il 70% di popolazione vaccinata, primo paese a riuscirci (escludendo quelli medio/piccoli, da 10milioni di pop. in su)
Italia al 61% (da OpenData)
L'UE (55,5%) sorpassa gli USA, inchiodati dalla mancanza di persone da vaccinare
Africa appena al 3% https://t.co/6fO9FMRo6o
『コトバンク』の辞書に小学館の中日辞典と日中辞典が入ったと友人から連絡があった。しかも、辞書の見出し項目1つ1つがURIが持てるようになっている。友人は「すごい」と興奮している。Linked Open Data化はついに辞書まで及んだ。

@thuyvytnguyen I'm going to gently challenge this premise by saying that I think this is a core part of being a scientist and, like dissemination, scientists need to figure out how to build it naturally into their work flow. Good open data habits in trainees is hopefully how this issue resolves

Hace 7 años me mostraron esta imagen y desde entonces sigue siendo mi referente en torno a cómo deberían ser los datos abiertos. Los huevos y la leche son los datos, el pastel es cuando se convierten en información. https://t.co/xuVQvlqzIe

New #openscience improvements @LangCognition: open data is now a requirement and author guide now encourages submission of replication studies, meta-analyses, and null results. Also consider us as a venue for your Registered Reports, as we now support this article category! https://t.co/vjNas8tTLB
With the release of our new author guidelines, Language and Cognition has updated its open data policy. We now require data and analysis code to be on a publicly accessible repository. #openscience

France cannot be the world's leading #opendata nation unless its senate, its national assembly, and its Presidential residence all publish the inventory of their wine cellars to @datagouvfr. It's as simple as that.

A6: Accessible open data & tools that highlight health inequities like @CDCgov's #500cities project are important for #EnvironmentalJustice since they are a starting point for all stakeholders to learn the issues & start working on solutions! #TrackingChat https://t.co/nf9Actmk4i https://t.co/iLgZvK0fn2

📰 Depois de diversos atrasos, finalmente o @minsaude respondeu ao nosso pedido de acesso à informação (criado em 17 de maio), onde questionamos os problemas que identificamos nos microdados de vacinação. Confira a resposta na íntegra: https://t.co/Y7H3KIzKPq #opendata #covid19

A6: Open data and related tools are essential to creating a more environmentally just city. It provides support to community advocates and keeps us accountable to the people we serve. #TrackingChat https://t.co/PFQ70jacBm

A6. Everyone deserves the same degree of protection from environmental and health hazards. Accessible, open data like on CDC’s Tracking Network can be used to identify communities at risk: https://t.co/0UVO4kHLez #TrackingChat https://t.co/9usHmjYMn8
